titles: A proclamation concernyng eatyng of vvhite meates made the III. day of February, the XXXIII yere of the reygne of the kynges most royall maiesty.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
publisher: Tho Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Because of scarcity, temporarily dispenses with laws of abstinence during Lent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
